title: Diana funny moments video with friends (and other shenanigans)

embed.description: "Yer a wizard [insert whole enemy team]" - Gandalf the pink -----------------------------[But wait! There's more (・ωｰ)～☆]------------------------------ Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/tgsamaritan Twitter ♫♪: https://twitter.com/TGSamaritan Facebook page ( -_-): https://www.facebook.com/TheGSamaritan/ Be a Lad and Subscribe ^_^: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCGUfJa_l250yQj7PX0TnEg?sub_confirmation=1 Please Like and Subscribe (and share) if you enjoy my stuff.

body: Just a small youtuber trying to hunt for views lol. The videos are actually quite decently edited tho.

replies.body: I understand how most people don't bother doing this, but it's good practice to properly credit the artist of the work on your video's thumbnail. Even if you just found it on a random website and no credit was there, you have the tools to search for it (such as reverse image searching on Google).
